evidence.claim: Lily Martin Care adheres to HIPAA regulations for healthcare data privacy and security.
The company discusses X12 transactions in their healthcare workflow documentation.
Lily Martin Care's systems work with HL7 protocols to facilitate healthcare communication.
FHIR standards are integrated into their patient data handling processes for improved interoperability.

icp.icp_reason: Engages in healthcare data exchange with strong focus on HIPAA and X12 standards.
